title: DOJ launches criminal investigation into Fed Chair Jerome Powell, he says
full_text: DOJ launches criminal investigation into Fed Chair Jerome Powell, he says. Federal prosecutors have launched a criminal investigation into Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, he confirmed in a statement Sunday night.. In an extraordinary escalation of a months-long attack on the independence of the Federal Reserve, federal prosecutors have launched a criminal investigation into Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell,… [+889 chars]
